title: Young Voices
text:
The purpose of this research is to understand how children aged 10-12 navigate their social world; understand cultural, economic, and political issues; and how their parents help them throughout this learning process.
To answer these questions, our project team devised survey and interview instruments to learn the experiences of children and their parents.






Christopher Johnston Professor of Political Science Duke University







Jessi Streib Associate Professor of Sociology Duke University







Stephen Vaisey Professor of Sociology & Political Science Duke University







Craig Rawlings Associate Professor of Sociology Duke University









Curtis Bram Assistant Professor of Political Science University of Texas at Dallas







Turgut Keskintürk Ph.D. Student of Sociology Duke University







Martín Opertti Ph.D. Student of Political Science Duke University
